titleStmt.title: Faith vindicated from possibility of falshood, or, The immovable firmness and certainty of the motives to Christian faith asserted against that tenet, which, denying infallibility of authority, subverts its foundation, and renders it uncertain
titleStmt.author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to John Sergeant. cf. NUC pre-1956.
